guide.title: level65_asmo
guide.message:
Greetings! You may not know Shugo, and i guess you never will, Jang Jang!
Shugo got some utilities for you to start your Journey, Jang!
Daeva got no choice but to accept Shugos present!
Maybe some day Shugo will see you, Daeva.
May you earn glory and wealth.. so you can pay Shugo, Jang Jang!

~ Jakunerk

guide.title: level65_ely

guide.title: level65_all_manastone
guide.message:
You again! You still don't know Shugo, and i guess you never will, Jang Jang!
Shugo got some Manastones for you to use on your Armor, Jang!
Daeva got no choice but to accept Shugos present!
Who knows, maybe some day Shugo will see you, Daeva.
May you earn glory and wealth.. so you can pay Shugo, Jang Jang!

~ Jakunerk

guide.title: level65_assassin_gear_asmo
guide.message:
Greetings Daeva! You still don't know Shugo, and i guess you never will, Jang Jang!
Shugo heard you got no Armor for my Manastones, Jang!
Shugo knows you picked Assassin! Shugo is afraid of shadows, but not of you,Jang! Daeva got no choice but to accept Shugos present!
It's not excluded that some day Shugo will see you, Daeva.
May you earn glory and wealth.. so you can pay Shugo, Jang Jang!

~ Jakunerk

guide.title: level65_all_skin
guide.message:
Greetings! Yet you don't know Shugo, and maybe you never will, Jang Jang!
Shugo started to like you, so he prepared something special, Jang!
Daeva got no choice but to accept Shugos present, a last time!
Hopefully, Shugo will see you some day, my friend.
So earn glory and wealth, find Shugo and pay for the presents, Jang Jang!

~ Your Jakunerk
